message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.DB, cs.SI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of detecting terms that can be interesting to the advertiser, which is related to information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The use of FCA and association rules suggests a connection to database systems (cs.DB) and machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the application of these techniques to internet advertising suggests a possible connection to social media (cs.SI).
